attributes.action: Create a non profit financial institution primarily for wages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is almost a neccessity to own a bank account to recieve an income from employers. It is almost unheard of to have cash in hand.
 Banks are private institutions solely made to make profit from its customers.
 There should be a non profit alternative for those just wishing to recieve their wages.
